add a task to file 2020 taxes

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes")
```
Remind me to file 2020 taxes

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes")
```
I need to file 2020 taxes

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes")
```

add a task to file 2020 taxes with the following description: "Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!"

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",description="Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!")
```

Remind me to file 2020 taxes, and add the following to the task:
Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",description="Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!")
```

I need to file 2020 taxes. Attach this:
Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",description="Collect all necessary financial documents such as W-2s, 1099s, and receipts for deductions. Decide whether to file manually... You got this!")
```
add a task to file 2020 taxes by Friday

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",deadline="Friday")
```
Remind me to file 2020 taxes on Friday

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",deadline="Friday")
```
I need to file 2020 taxes by Friday

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",deadline="Friday")
```
add a task to file 2020 taxes, assign it to John Doe

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",assignee_name="John Doe")
```
Remind John Doe to file 2020 taxes

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",assignee_name="John Doe")
```
tell John Doe to file 2020 taxes

```python
add_task(title="File 2020 taxes",assignee_name="John Doe")
```
find tasks that mention taxes

```python
search_tasks(task_title='tax')
```
List all tasks related to taxes

```python
search_tasks(task_title='tax')
```
help me find all tasks related to taxes

```python
search_tasks(task_title='tax')
```
